titleStmt.title: The method of chemical philosophie and physick. Being a brief introduction to the one, and a true discovery of the other. namely, of diseases, their qualities, causes, symptoms, and certain cures. The like never before extant in English.
titleStmt.author: Philagathoū. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.G. for Nath: Brook, at the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: The words "Their .. Cures." are bracketed together on title page.
Running title reads: The method of chemical physick.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
